pages.text: The $(major)Slimy Death$(0) Gene makes it so, $(minor)upon the player dying, the death is canceled and several friendly Slimes spawn$(0).$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 5 minutes.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)cannot be given to mobs$(0)
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br2)â€¢ Slime
